2.text: Apply a heat protectant serum to your hair.

3.text: Comb your hair with a wide-tooth comb to make sure you remove any tangles.

4.text: Hold the blow dryer above your head, with the nozzle pointed down toward your face.

5.text: Use a flat paddle brush to brush your bangs all to one side of your forehead.

6.text: Brush your bangs in the opposite direction across your forehead.

7.text: Hold the flat brush under your bangs, right against your roots, and blow dry straight down your hair.

8.text: Hold a round brush under your bangs, against the roots.

9.text: Twist the brush under your bangs to curl the hair on the brush.

10.text: Brush your hair straight down and release it from the round brush.
